document.full_text: new york's nassau county on wednesday announced plans to boost its economy with a new ice hockey arena and a racetrack casino, but both would be subject to voter and state approval.
document.title: nassau county doubles down with casino and arena
lines_and_colors: new york's nassau county on wednesday announced plans to boost its economy with a new ice hockey arena and a racetrack casino, but both would be subject to voter and state approval.
